title: Getting Started
content: Welcome to the knowledge base! Learn how to navigate and explore topics.

title: Installation
content: How to install the app on your device. Covers system requirements and setup steps.

title: Account Setup
content: Create your account, configure your profile, and set security options.

title: Troubleshooting
content: Common issues and how to resolve them. Includes login problems, crashes, and data sync.

title: Advanced Configuration
content: Fine-tune your experience with advanced settings, integrations, and customizations.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
content: Answers to the most common questions users ask about the app.

title: Privacy Policy
content: Details on how your data is collected, stored, and protected.

title: Terms of Service
content: Rules and guidelines you agree to when using the application.

title: Release Notes
content: Latest changes, improvements, and bug fixes by version.

title: Contributing
content: How you can contribute to the project, submit bug reports, and suggest features.
